name: vws-js-app
description: Electron application for web-scraping on torrent video websites

scripts.package-win: npm install && npm link ../vws-js-lib && electron-packager .  --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=app/assets/icons/win/icon.ico --no-prune --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Video Website Scraper"
scripts.package-all: npm install && npm link ../vws-js-lib && npm run package-mac && npm run package-win && npm run package-linux

author: Rodrigo Villamil PÃ©rez
